\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}

\makeatletter
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% User specified LaTeX commands.
\usepackage{tikz}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\usepackage[miktex]{gnuplottex}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}

\begin{tikzpicture}
\begin{axis}[
     width=200pt, height = 130pt, compat=1.5.1,grid style={ultra thin},every axis plot post/.append style={thick},
     x tick label style={font=\footnotesize},y tick label style={font=\footnotesize},
     scale only axis,grid=none,axis lines=middle,
     xlabel={$t$},
     ylabel={$f(t)/\sqrt{1+t^2}$},
     xmin= 0,
     xmax= 1.08,
     domain= 0:1.1,
     ymin=0.885,
     ymax=1.03,
     xtick={0,0.2, ..., 1},
     ytick={0.9, 1, 1.1},
     restrict y to domain=0:1.05,
     restrict x to domain=0:1,
     legend style={at={(0.5,-0.05)},anchor=north,nodes={right}},
 ]
 \addplot[mark=none,color=blue, samples=1000]{ (2/pi* (2* sqrt(x) + (1-x)* (pi/2 - 2*rad(atan( sqrt(x) ))))) / sqrt( 1 + x^2)};
 %\addlegendentry{$y = \tan^{-1}x $};
 \end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}

\vspace{2em}

\begin{tikzpicture}
\begin{axis}[
     width=200pt, height = 130pt, compat=1.5.1,grid style={ultra thin},every axis plot post/.append style={thick},
     x tick label style={font=\normalsize},y tick label style={font=\footnotesize},
     scale only axis,grid=none,axis lines=middle,
     xlabel={},
     ylabel={},
     xmin= -20,
     xmax= 20,     
     ymin=0,
     ymax=220,
     xtick={0.02},
     xticklabels = {},
     ytick={0},
     restrict y to domain=0:200,
     restrict x to domain=-40:40,
     legend style={at={(0.5,-0.05)},anchor=north,nodes={right}},
 ]
	\addplot[mark=none,color=blue, samples=1000, domain= 6:20]{  x^2 + 1.5* x * (cos(deg(x-6)) - 1) };
	\addplot[mark=none,color=blue, samples=1000, domain= -20:-6]{ x^2 - 1.5* x * (cos(deg(x+6)) - 1)};
	\addplot[mark=none,color=blue, samples=1000, domain= -6:6]{  x^2 };
	%\draw[dashed]
	%\addplot[dashed, mark=none,color=red, samples=1000, domain= 6.7:17]{  6.2* (x-6.7) + 43  };
	%\addplot[dashed, mark=none,color=red, samples=1000, domain= -13:1.5]{  - 10* (x+13) + 166  };
 %\addlegendentry{$y = \tan^{-1}x $};
 \end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}



\end{document}
